"Bring down all targets for subjugation"
"希少エネミー討伐"
"希少エネミーを倒せ！"
"希少エネミーを倒せ！"
"討伐対象を全て"
"Confirmation of achievement of target…nope, this is the confirmation of another enemy reaction. All members, please be vigilant of your surroundings."
"Confirmation of the reaction of the rare species. All members, please deal with them. "
"Good job. Thank you for the speedy way in which you dealt with it."

"目標の達成を確認……いえ、これは

"Seems like a rare enemy yeah…all members, deal with it quickly."
"The reaction has completely disappeared. It was an unexpected enemy attack, but you have done well. "

"目標の達成を確認した……いや、待て。

"Confirmation of achievement of target….but, what the? There is still reaction from the enemy, it seems…careful, careful!"
"Argh, seems like the rare enemy has made their way here! Please deal with them!"
"It has been a rare enemy yeah. Good job!"

"目標の達成を確認……って、あれれ？
